answers.answer: There are some that find there is a relationship between gallbladder issues and gastroparesis, however for the vast majority of those who have gastroparesis (outside of those in the category of having diabetes) there is no known causative factor. It's idiopathic.

question: how does someone that doesn't have diabetes get gastro parasis.  Diabetes does run in the family, though.  I have a brother that has perncious anemia.
title: gastro parasis
